law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 64, effective June 25, 2009; and ch. 16, sec. 65, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006; and ch. 211, sec. 126, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 50, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2009). This section was amended by 2009 Ky. Acts chs. 11 and 16, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
